detailed_instructions: Many media players, including Microsoft Windows Media Player (Windows) and VideoLAN VLC media player (multiplatform), can open an M3UP file and play the playlist it contains. In some cases, you may have to change your M3UP file's extension to .m3u8 before opening it.
You can also open an M3UP file in any text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows) or Apple TextEdit (Mac), to view the text it contains.
